articles.title: Man discovers bud had been lodged in his ear for five years - BBC
articles.description: Wallace Lee says he feared he was going deaf before the small white object was finally removed.
articles.content:
A man who thought he was going deaf has discovered that part of an earbud had been lodged in his ear for five years.
